extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.GeoEnrichIP
extension.description: Looks up geolocation information for an IP address and adds the geo information to FlowFile attributes. The geo data is provided as a MaxMind database. The attribute that contains the IP address to lookup is provided by the 'IP Address Attribute' property. If the name of the attribute provided is 'X', then the the attributes added by enrichment will take the form X.geo.<fieldName>

property.name: Geo Database File
property.description: Path to Maxmind IP Enrichment Database File

property.name: IP Address Attribute
property.description: The name of an attribute whose value is a dotted decimal IP address for which enrichment should occur

property.name: Log Level
property.description: The Log Level to use when an IP is not found in the database. Accepted values: INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR.

relationship.name: found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after successfully enriching attributes with data provided by database

relationship.name: not found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after unsuccessfully enriching attributes because no data was found

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.lookup.micros
writesAttribute.description: The number of microseconds that the geo lookup took

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.city
writesAttribute.description: The city identified for the IP address

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.accuracy
writesAttribute.description: The accuracy radius if provided by the database (in Kilometers)

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.latitude
writesAttribute.description: The latitude identified for this IP address

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.longitude
writesAttribute.description: The longitude identified for this IP address

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.subdivision.N
writesAttribute.description: Each subdivision that is identified for this IP address is added with a one-up number appended to the attribute name, starting with 0

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.subdivision.isocode.N
writesAttribute.description: The ISO code for the subdivision that is identified by X.geo.subdivision.N

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.country
writesAttribute.description: The country identified for this IP address

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.country.isocode
writesAttribute.description: The ISO Code for the country identified

writesAttribute.name: X.geo.postalcode
writesAttribute.description: The postal code for the country identified

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.GeoEnrichIPRecord
extension.description: Looks up geolocation information for an IP address and adds the geo information to FlowFile attributes. The geo data is provided as a MaxMind database. This version uses the NiFi Record API to allow large scale enrichment of record-oriented data sets. Each field provided by the MaxMind database can be directed to a field of the user's choosing by providing a record path for that field configuration.

property.name: Geo Database File
property.description: Path to Maxmind IP Enrichment Database File

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-record-reader
property.description: Record reader service to use for reading the flowfile contents.

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-record-writer
property.description: Record writer service to use for enriching the flowfile contents.

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-split-found-not-found
property.description: Separate records that have been enriched from ones that have not. Default behavior is to send everything to the found relationship if even one record is enriched.

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-ip-record-path
property.description: The record path to retrieve the IP address for doing the lookup.

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-city-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the city identified for the IP address

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-latitude-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the latitude identified for this IP address

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-longitude-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the longitude identified for this IP address

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-country-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the country identified for this IP address

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-country-iso-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the ISO Code for the country identified

property.name: geo-enrich-ip-country-postal-record-path
property.description: Record path for putting the postal code for the country identified

property.name: Log Level
property.description: The Log Level to use when an IP is not found in the database. Accepted values: INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR.

relationship.name: found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after successfully enriching attributes with data provided by database

relationship.name: not found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after unsuccessfully enriching attributes because no data was found

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The original input flowfile goes to this relationship regardless of whether the content was enriched or not.

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.ISPEnrichIP
extension.description: Looks up ISP information for an IP address and adds the information to FlowFile attributes. The ISP data is provided as a MaxMind ISP database. (Note that this is NOT the same as the GeoLite database utilized by some geo enrichment tools). The attribute that contains the IP address to lookup is provided by the 'IP Address Attribute' property. If the name of the attribute provided is 'X', then the the attributes added by enrichment will take the form X.isp.<fieldName>

property.name: Geo Database File
property.description: Path to Maxmind IP Enrichment Database File

property.name: IP Address Attribute
property.description: The name of an attribute whose value is a dotted decimal IP address for which enrichment should occur

property.name: Log Level
property.description: The Log Level to use when an IP is not found in the database. Accepted values: INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR.

relationship.name: found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after successfully enriching attributes with data provided by database

relationship.name: not found
relationship.description: Where to route flow files after unsuccessfully enriching attributes because no data was found

writesAttribute.name: X.isp.lookup.micros
writesAttribute.description: The number of microseconds that the geo lookup took

writesAttribute.name: X.isp.asn
writesAttribute.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) identified for the IP address

writesAttribute.name: X.isp.asn.organization
writesAttribute.description: The Organization Associated with the ASN identified

writesAttribute.name: X.isp.name
writesAttribute.description: The name of the ISP associated with the IP address provided

writesAttribute.name: X.isp.organization
writesAttribute.description: The Organization associated with the IP address provided
